sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'

import CiteService from '../../../../service/cite.service'
import QueryService from '../../../../service/query.service'

import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'
import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'
import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'
import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'
import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'

import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'



class PetCardClient extends Component {

    constructor(props) {
        super(props)
        this.state = {
            cites: "",
            querys: "",
            vetHospital: ""
        }
        this.citeService = new CiteService()
        this.queryService = new QueryService()

    }

    getQuerysInfo = () => {
        this.queryService.queryFromPet(this.props._id)
        .then(response => this.setState({ querys: response.data }))
        .catch(err => console.log(err))
    }





    render() {
        return (
            <Container as="section">

                

                <Row>
                    <Col as="article">
                        <Card>
                            <Card.Img variant="top" src={this.props.petPicPath} />

                            <Card.Header as="h5">{this.props.name}</Card.Header>
                            <Card.Body>
                                <Card.Title>{this.props.species}</Card.Title>
                                <Card.Text> {this.props.breed} </Card.Text>
                                <Button variant="primary">Detalles</Button>
                            </Card.Body>
                        </Card>

                    </Col>
                    <Col as="article">

                    {this.state.querys && this.stateloggedInUser.pets.map(pet =>  <PetCardClient key={pet._id} {...pet} />)}


                    

                    </Col>

                </Row>




            </Container>
        )
    }
}

export default PetCardClient
